Casamino Acids (CasA)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Description:
Definition:

.. list-table:: CasA composition
  :name: casa_comp
  :align: center
  :widths: 25 25
  :header-rows: 1
  
  * - BiGG ID
    - Compound name
  * - lys__L
    - Lysine
  * - his__L
    - Histidine
  * - arg__L
    - Arginine
  * - asp__L
    - Aspartic acid
  * - thr__L
    - Threonine
  * - glu__L
    - Glutamic acid
  * - gly
    - Glycine
  * - val__L
    - Valine
  * - met__L
    - Methionine
  * - ile__L
    - Isoleucine
  * - leu__L
    - Leucine
  * - tyr__L
    - Tyrosine
  * - phe__L
    - Phenylalanine
